font.strong: We handle the hard part - you keep the savings.

p.font: Marshmallow Streaming gives you the freedom to ditch the fees and take control of your home entertainment setup. We handle the heavy lifting—removing old gear, returning it for you, and installing the latest, no-rental alternatives that fit your needs.

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item g-height-10 g-col-lg-7 col-lg-7 order-1
o_colored_level o_grid_item g-col-lg-5 g-height-10 col-lg-5 order-2

font.strong: Rethink how much you pay the cable company.

span.font: We’ll help you find reliable internet service/connection for all of your household needs. Streaming offers instant entertainment like never before. From live TV to on-demand movies, we’ll set you up with the best devices and services for your lifestyle.

div.class: o_colored_level g-height-5 o_grid_item g-col-lg-4 col-lg-4 d-lg-block d-none o_snippet_mobile_invisible

span.font: Choose only the channels you actually watch, no fluff. Build a lineup that fits your lifestyle perfectly.

font.strong: No Rental Equipment, Fees, Hidden Taxes

span.font: Say goodbye to surprise charges, monthly rental fees, and the fine print cable companies love.
Record everything you want, whenever you want no space limits, no expiration dates, and no extra fees.
Stream through intuitive, sleek apps designed for every screen. No learning curve, no confusion just a smooth, modern experience.
Get all the flexibility and features you need without the bloated cost. Plans fit real budgets, not cable bills.
Watch live TV and recorded shows on any device, at home or on the go. Your content travels with you.

div.class: row justify-content-around align-items-center mx-5 pt40 pb32 px-5

span.strong: Discover How Much You Can Be Saving.

font.span: Use our quick calculator to find out how much you're spending on rental equipment and bloated service fees.

h1.font: We cancel your contracts, return your rentals, and handle the details so you can just sit back and relax.

font.span: We were dissatisfied with both the level of service and the expense of cable, but were unaware of how to find a reasonable alternative. Then we watched a Zoom session in which Marshmallow Streaming explained their turnkey approach that could convert us to streaming in fewer than two hours and save us more than $100 a month.

Mike and Marilyn Glass
Arlington Heights, IL

strong.font: Upgrade your business tech with no headaches.

p.font: From smarter office AV systems to small business security and networking, we make tech upgrades easy. Our team handles everything from setup to support so you can focus on running your business. Get reliable, professional-grade solutions without the stress, delays, or confusing contracts.
